title: ncurses 6.1 fails to build with Intel on a cluster
body:
`ncurses` fails to build with Intel ComposerXE2017 on a cluster.
This happens with 6.1 and 6.0.

Strangely enough, 6.0 installs ok with `gcc@4.8.5`...

### Expected Result

`ncurses` installs.
